trans-unit.source: Represents the method that executes on a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表在 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 上執行的方法。

trans-unit.source: When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> delegate or a <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate that is passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建立 managed 的執行緒時，有的執行緒執行的方法由<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>委派或<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派傳遞給<xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The thread does not begin executing until the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒不會開始執行之前<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 所表示之方法的第一行中開始執行<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>或<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic and C# users can omit the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate constructor when creating a thread.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和 C# 使用者可以省略<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>或<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派建構函式建立執行緒時。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 使用`AddressOf`運算子傳遞自己的方法時<xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，例如`Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`。

trans-unit.source: In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，只需要指定執行緒的程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會選擇正確的委派建構函式。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, creating a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> delegate for a static method in C++ requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 2.0 版建立<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>委派 for c + + 中的靜態方法必須只有一個參數： 回呼方法，類別名稱所限定的位址。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions two parameters were required when creating a delegate for a static method: zero (null) and the method address.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版中兩個參數是必要時建立靜態方法的委派： 零 (null) 和方法位址。

trans-unit.source: For an instance method, all versions require two parameters: the instance variable and the method address.
trans-unit.target: 所有版本的執行個體方法，都需要兩個參數： 執行個體變數和方法位址。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the syntax for creating and using a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> delegate with an instance method and with a static method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示建立和使用的語法<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>委派執行個體方法與使用靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: For another simple example that demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> delegate, see the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 另一個簡單的範例，示範如何建立<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>委派，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For more information about thread creation, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需執行緒建立的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立執行緒和開始時間傳遞資料](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md)。
